jcolibri.cbrcase
Interface CBRCaseBase

All Superinterfaces:
CBRTerm
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicCBRCaseBase
public interface CBRCaseBase
extends CBRTerm

This interface defines the methods that at least any Case Base must implement to be transparently used by the methods on the framework

Method Summary
 void close()
          Finalizes the work with Case Base, the changed because of cases learned or forgoten will be discarded.
 void closeAndUpdate()
          Finalizes the work with Case Base but commiting the changes done because of learned or forgottern cases.
 void forgetCases(java.util.Collection<CBRCase> cases)
          Remove a collection of new CBRCase objects to the current work session
 java.util.Collection<CBRCase> getAll()
          Returns all the cases available on this case base
 CaseEvalList knn(CBRCase cbrcase, int numCases, SimilarityFunction function)
          Returns the k nearest cases to the one given
 void learnCases(java.util.Collection<CBRCase> cases)
          Add a collection of new CBRCase objects to the current work session
 void loadAll()
          Loads all the Case reachable for the connector into memory.
 void loadFor(java.lang.String filter)
          Loads the cases the match the restrictions given by the filter.
 void setConnector(Connector connector)
          Get the connector instance that will use to access the media to retrieve the CBR Cases

knn

CaseEvalList knn(CBRCase cbrcase,
                 int numCases,
                 SimilarityFunction function)
Returns the k nearest cases to the one given

Parameters:
cbrcase - Case that will guide the searh. Retrieved cases will be similar to this one
numCases - Number of cases to be returned
function - Similarity function that is used to get the similarity between two cases
Returns:
Returns a collection containing CaseEvaluation objects
